coordination: Simplified coordination (post file claim 30s before edit) works well
ACTIVE_QUESTIONS.md + progress-log.md effective for async coordination
cultural_integration: Kaitiakitanga principles naturally integrate with ecosystem science
Māori data sovereignty essential for AI ethics lessons
Te reo Māori used respectfully throughout (glosses, correct usage)
External resources prioritize Māori perspectives and NZ context
technical_execution: Gold standard template applies consistently across all subject areas
External Resources section structure: 4 cards (Māori/Cultural, Subject-specific, NZ Resources, Teaching)
WALT/SC format: 4 specific objectives + 4 measurable success criteria
Professional CSS classes maintain visual consistency
